document_name: UN Joint Programme Implementation arrangement agreement
Project financial agreement between UN Trust Fund for Human Security and UNV

outputs.output_descr:
The goal of the project is "Improved economic, food, health and environmental security for the population of Karakalpakstan affected by the Aral Sea environmental disaster". UNV is responsible for two outputs: 1) to support mobilization of 1500 community and volunteer health care workers trained as apprentices in a health fellowship program sanctioned by the Ministry of Health with the main objective to decrease incidences of respiratory and other infections associated with environmental degradation and climate change;
2) To provide technical assistance with policy development on the recognition of health care apprentices by the Ministry of Health  to institutionalize national volunteer coordination within the  Ministry of Health and to support development of relevant policies and methodologies;

project_descr: Sustaining Livelihoods Affected by the Aral Sea Disaster in Republic of Karakalpakstan within the Republic of Uzbekistan
project_title: SUSTAINING LIVELIHOODS IN ARAL SEA AREAS
